ModMetaData.name: Spidercamp's Dog Pack
ModMetaData.author: Spidercamp
ModMetaData.description:
Includes all Spidercamp dog releases. Will be updated with additional breeds as they are released.
Included Breeds: Afghan Hound Border Collie Borzoi Bull Terrier Bull Mastiff Caucasian Shepherd Chow Chow Collie Doberman Golden Retriever Greyhound Miniature Dachshund Miniature Schnauzer Old English Sheepdog Saint Bernard Standard Poodle Pug Welsh Corgi
Additional Features: To use with A Dog Said... *Step 1: Subscribe to LBE's A Dog Said Easy Patcher *Step 2: Load mods in the following order A Dog Said... LBE's A Dog Said Easy Patcher
Use as battle mount or as a mount in caravans - Giddy-Up by roolo: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1216999901 http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1217001091 http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1253251478
